#These modules depend on Time::Piece.
#You should probably make sure you don't break their
#test cases since they do no telling what with Time::Piece.
#generated by App::ListRevDeps and rev_deps.pl
#needed libs for compiling: 
#libxml2-dev libgd-dev uuid-dev libmariadb-dev-compat
#and don't forget PERL_USE_UNSAFE_INC
